Summary Note:
Furrer Riedo Wyss and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Furrer Riedo Wyss is a seasoned professional with over 18 years of experience.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Furrer Riedo Wyss is married to Lena. They are proud parents of 3 children: Daniela, Riedo and Elena.
Education Background:
Furrer finished secondary school at Wirtschaftsgymnasium Olten Solothurn in 2000.
He then attended EPFL, which he graduated in 2005.
Occupation History:
Furrer Riedo Wyss is a 42 year old and comes from Switzerland.
Furrer Riedo Wyss began his professional journey as a Research Scientist at Johnson & Johnson Switzerland in 2007, laying the foundation for future success.
His subsequent role was as a Clinical Trials Manager at Pfizer AG (Swiss branch), where he continued to grow professionally from 2011 to 2015.
At Pfizer AG (Swiss branch), he worked as a Regulatory Affairs Director from 2016 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 330000 CHF, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
He owns flat in Bellinzona, where he resides. It is worth 1710000 CHF.

He purchased townhouse in Schaffhausen, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 2470000 CHF.
He inherited a significant sum of 1280000 CHF from his father, a respected Venture Capitalist, in 2011, which he has wisely invested.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
